${ModID}:AbstractExileCard.NAME: Not Actually a Card
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Sigils can only be played via discard.
These Exile cards can not be drafted normally. They may be found in events, relics, or from Neow.

${ModID}:GenericResonantCard.NAME: Resonance
${ModID}:GenericResonantCard.FLAVOR: It's like a magic boomerang, except it isn't a boomerang, it just boomerangs back to you like a boomerang.

${ModID}:IceDamage.NAME: Cold
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Whenever a creature with Frostbite attacks it takes damage and Frostbite is reduced by 1.

${ModID}:EldritchDamage.NAME: Eldritch
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Temporary HP is lost at the end of battle.

${ModID}:PhantasmalDamage.NAME: Phantasmal
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Flanked creatures lose HP when they are attacked.

${ModID}:StaffStrike.NAME: Staff Strike
${ModID}:StaffStrike.FLAVOR: The wizard's staff has a knob on the end.

${ModID}:Defend.NAME: Defend
${ModID}:Defend.FLAVOR: I wear a buckler as a very last line of defense.

${ModID}:PhantomFist.NAME: Phantom Fist
${ModID}:PhantomFist.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard a card.
${ModID}:PhantomFist.FLAVOR: It's like hitting them with a fist, except the fist is the size of a watermelon and made of steel.

${ModID}:ColdSigil.NAME: Cold Sigil
${ModID}:ColdSigil.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to the lowest HP enemy.
${ModID}:ColdSigil.FLAVOR: Inscribe the appropriate runes onto an object, cast an incantation, and push your mana in. During battle it will cost no mana to activate it, although you will need to throw it accurately.

${ModID}:AcidSpray.NAME: Acid Spray
${ModID}:AcidSpray.FLAVOR: An excellent spell for quickly destroying an opponent's armor.

${ModID}:Miasma.NAME: Miasma
${ModID}:Miasma.DESCRIPTION: Apply !${ModID}:M2! Weak. NL Target deals !M! less damage with attacks this turn.
${ModID}:Miasma.FLAVOR: Every year the new students call it the fart spell and believe they've attained the pinnacle of humor.

${ModID}:FrozenLance.NAME: Frozen Lance
${ModID}:FrozenLance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each card discarded this turn.
${ModID}:FrozenLance.FLAVOR: I learned this spell from a stranger on a train.

${ModID}:GhostStrike.NAME: Ghost Strike
${ModID}:GhostStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain [E] next turn.
${ModID}:GhostStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain [E] [E] next turn.
${ModID}:GhostStrike.FLAVOR: Phantasmal spells are not actually ghosts or phantoms.

${ModID}:LightningBolt.NAME: Lightning Bolt
${ModID}:LightningBolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to the highest hp enemy. NL Discard a card.
${ModID}:LightningBolt.FLAVOR: Don't call it thunder bolt. You don't kill things with thunder.

${ModID}:Anticipate.NAME: Anticipate
${ModID}:Anticipate.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Activate: You may draw a card and discard a card once this combat.
${ModID}:Anticipate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Activate: You may draw a card and discard a card twice this combat.
${ModID}:Anticipate.FLAVOR: A battle is much easier to win if you can learn to predict your opponent's movements.

${ModID}:Barrier.NAME: Barrier
${ModID}:Barrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw a card.
${ModID}:Barrier.FLAVOR: A great spell for when you need to defend yourself but stay mobile.

${ModID}:Blink.NAME: Blink
${ModID}:Blink.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Discard !M! cards next turn.
${ModID}:Blink.FLAVOR: Quite often the best defense is simply not being there.

${ModID}:LeadBall.NAME: Lead Ball
${ModID}:LeadBall.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard a card.
${ModID}:LeadBall.FLAVOR: Launch it with magic. 5 points per tooth you knock out.

${ModID}:Gale.NAME: Gale
${ModID}:Gale.FLAVOR: I've been looking for an oppurtunity to launch a monster off a cliff with this, but there's never a cliff around when I need one.

${ModID}:Flare.NAME: Flare
${ModID}:Flare.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If there are no other cards in your hand, gain !M! additional Block.
${ModID}:Flare.FLAVOR: The aggressive version of they can't catch you if they can't see you.

${ModID}:StoneDaggers.NAME: Stone Daggers
${ModID}:StoneDaggers.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each debuff on the enemy.

${ModID}:CrumblingSigil.NAME: Crumbling Sigil
${ModID}:CrumblingSigil.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies take !M! more non-Attack damage.
${ModID}:CrumblingSigil.FLAVOR: These are a pain because they fall apart in a few days and then you have to remake it.

${ModID}:BlizzardSigil.NAME: Blizzard Sigil
${ModID}:BlizzardSigil.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to the lowest hp enemy. NL Take !M! damage.
${ModID}:BlizzardSigil.FLAVOR: This is difficult to throw without freezing your hand off.

${ModID}:SpinningSigil.NAME: Spinning Sigil
${ModID}:SpinningSigil.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block whenever you play a card this turn. Draw a card. Discard a card.

${ModID}:HardSigil.NAME: Hard Sigil
${ModID}:HardSigil.FLAVOR: Sigils take on the properties of their spells to a minor degree. This sigil is particularly hard to break.

${ModID}:ShrapnelSigil.NAME: Shrapnel Sigil
${ModID}:ShrapnelSigil.FLAVOR: The pieces of the sigil itself become shrapnel.

${ModID}:SlipperySigil.NAME: Slippery Sigil
${ModID}:SlipperySigil.DESCRIPTION: The next time you would take attack damage, reduce it by half.
${ModID}:SlipperySigil.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The next !M! times you would take attack damage, reduce it by half.

${ModID}:TranslucentSigil.NAME: Translucent Sigil
${ModID}:TranslucentSigil.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to the highest HP enemy. NL Draw one less card next turn.

${ModID}:ClockSigil.NAME: Clock Sigil
${ModID}:ClockSigil.FLAVOR: Slow is such a useful spell.

${ModID}:SpiralSigil.NAME: Spiral Sigil
${ModID}:SpiralSigil.DESCRIPTION: Apply ${ModID}:Jinx to ALL enemies equal to their debuffs.
${ModID}:SpiralSigil.FLAVOR: When they're down, keep them down.

${ModID}:SharpSigil.NAME: Sharp Sigil
${ModID}:SharpSigil.DESCRIPTION: Enemy takes !M! damage when attacked this turn. NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Frostbite.

${ModID}:Weave.NAME: Weave
${ModID}:Weave.DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! Exile Attack cards. NL They gain each otherâ€™s elements for the rest of combat.
${ModID}:Weave.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: All Exile Attack cards in your hand gain each other's elements for the rest of combat.
${ModID}:Weave.FLAVOR: It is difficult to include a piece of one spell into another spell, but the payoff can be great if you are clever with it.

${ModID}:ConsumeTheWeak.NAME: Consume the Weak
${ModID}:ConsumeTheWeak.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply 1 ${ModID}:Jinx for each Buff you have.

${ModID}:Harmony.NAME: Harmony
${ModID}:Harmony.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain Block equal to your ${ModID}:Resonance amount times !M!.
${ModID}:Harmony.FLAVOR: Practice aligning the different pieces of your resonant spells. The more in tune they are, the more powerful they become.

${ModID}:VoodooDoll.NAME: Voodoo Doll
${ModID}:VoodooDoll.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If you Exhausted a Curse, deal damage !M! more times.
${ModID}:VoodooDoll.FLAVOR: While the victim is asleep, hold the doll's hand in a cup of warm water. Classic.

${ModID}:SonicAgony.NAME: Sonic Agony
${ModID}:SonicAgony.FLAVOR: Resonant spells are a favorite of mine. You have to keep spending the mana of course, but you don't have to do anything else to keep casting it.

${ModID}:LongNote.NAME: Long Note
${ModID}:LongNote.DESCRIPTION: Enemy takes !M! damage at the start of its turns.
${ModID}:LongNote.FLAVOR: This is the song that never ends. It goes on and on my friends.

${ModID}:DeafeningChimes.NAME: Deafening Chimes
${ModID}:DeafeningChimes.FLAVOR: Put in some ear plugs before you use this one.

${ModID}:Energize.NAME: Energize
${ModID}:Energize.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Vigor. NL Draw a card.

${ModID}:BadVibes.NAME: Bad Vibes
${ModID}:BadVibes.FLAVOR: A personal favorite of mine. If the enemy has a lot of bad luck, everything you cast is more likely to be effective.

${ModID}:BrrZerk.NAME: BrrZerk
${ModID}:BrrZerk.FLAVOR: Another spell I got to name.

${ModID}:ElementalProwess.NAME: Elemental Prowess
${ModID}:ElementalProwess.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, ALL enemies take !M! damage of each damage type it had.

${ModID}:Convert.NAME: Convert
${ModID}:Convert.DESCRIPTION: The next non-power non-exhausting Exile card you play becomes ${ModID}:Resonant.
${ModID}:Convert.FLAVOR: They said it couldn't be done. But I managed to invent this anyway.

${ModID}:GreaterBarrier.NAME: Greater Barrier
${ModID}:GreaterBarrier.FLAVOR: Yeah, I'm going to nope out of taking that axe to my face, thanks.

${ModID}:WellPrepared.NAME: Well Prepared
${ModID}:WellPrepared.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Discard a card.
${ModID}:WellPrepared.FLAVOR: Know every detail of every spell you might use. Practice until you instinctively know where each magic item you carry is and how to activate it.

${ModID}:ManaBlood.NAME: Mana Blood
${ModID}:ManaBlood.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain [E] and draw a card.
${ModID}:ManaBlood.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain [E] and draw a card.
${ModID}:ManaBlood.FLAVOR: If you inject the right reagents into your veins, you can become much more powerful. I was called foolish for improving myself this way.

${ModID}:DimensionalPouch.NAME: Dimensional Pouch
${ModID}:DimensionalPouch.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Activate: Once per turn you may spend [E] to draw !M! cards.
${ModID}:DimensionalPouch.FLAVOR: You can't store more things by putting a pouch inside of a pouch. I've tried.

${ModID}:ArcaneBeam.NAME: Arcane Beam
${ModID}:ArcaneBeam.FLAVOR: Only a few have mastered this spell. Those who do are considered masters of their craft.

${ModID}:PhantomMace.NAME: Phantom Mace
${ModID}:PhantomMace.FLAVOR: Knock them to the floor then do a Gallagher.

${ModID}:Dispel.NAME: Dispel
${ModID}:Dispel.DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL of your debuffs. NL Gain !M! Artifact.
${ModID}:Dispel.FLAVOR: It pays to be prepared for one of your spells to misfire.

${ModID}:VoidBall.NAME: Void Ball
${ModID}:VoidBall.FLAVOR: More enemies just means more life to steal.

${ModID}:Debilitate.NAME: Debilitate
${ModID}:Debilitate.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable. NL Apply !${ModID}:M2! Poison. Enemy deals !${ModID}:M2! less damage this turn.

${ModID}:Drain.NAME: Drain
${ModID}:Drain.DESCRIPTION: Steal !M! Strength. NL Costs 1 less for each [${ModID}:EldritchIcon] attack played this combat.
${ModID}:Drain.FLAVOR: Sometimes you only need to see a few seconds into the future.

${ModID}:TelekineticBlades.NAME: Telekinetic Blades
${ModID}:TelekineticBlades.FLAVOR: Practice until you can use the blade while casting other spells.

${ModID}:TrickStaff.NAME: Trick Staff
${ModID}:TrickStaff.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Deals !M! additional damage to enemies who intend to attack.
${ModID}:TrickStaff.FLAVOR: My staff is enchanted with several surprises. One of which is suddenly doubling in length to slam a charging enemy right in the gut.

${ModID}:EnchantedDagger.NAME: Enchanted Dagger
${ModID}:EnchantedDagger.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gains all damage types of other cards in your hand.
${ModID}:EnchantedDagger.FLAVOR: Magic still has great value even if you're wielding a blade.

${ModID}:Grease.NAME: Grease
${ModID}:Grease.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Discard a card.
${ModID}:Grease.FLAVOR: Quick and easy to cast. It won't win a fight by itself, but the tactical value is high.

${ModID}:Vitality.NAME: Vitality
${ModID}:Vitality.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you discard a Status card, Exhaust it and draw a card.
${ModID}:Vitality.FLAVOR: Practice being able to fight while in pain. Or you'll have to practice fighting while dead.

${ModID}:Concentrate.NAME: Concentrate
${ModID}:Concentrate.FLAVOR: I teach students how to concentrate before teaching them any spells. Because having your mind wander in the middle of casting fireball is a bad idea.

${ModID}:CurseWeapon.NAME: Curse Weapon
${ModID}:CurseWeapon.FLAVOR: This is why spells are superior. A weapon can be damaged, destroyed. The only way to destroy my spells is to destroy me.

${ModID}:SickBurn.NAME: Sick Burn
${ModID}:SickBurn.FLAVOR: I got to name this spell. I'm quite proud of it.

${ModID}:SpinToWin.NAME: Spin To Win
${ModID}:SpinToWin.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw a card. NL Discard a card. NL Add a copy of this card to your discard pile.

${ModID}:Study.NAME: Study
${ModID}:Study.DESCRIPTION: !M! turns from now, choose 1 of !${ModID}:M2! rare cards to add into your hand. It costs 0 that turn.
${ModID}:Study.FLAVOR: I didn't get to be a badass by sitting around on the couch all day.

${ModID}:TargetWeakness.NAME: Target Weakness
${ModID}:TargetWeakness.DESCRIPTION: For !M! turns, enemy takes 50% more damage from Attacks if they are Weakened.
${ModID}:TargetWeakness.FLAVOR: The Ironclads, before they were destroyed, trained themselves to quickly analyze opponents for weaknesses. I once hired an old veteran to teach me how to analyze my foes. It significantly improved my tactics.

${ModID}:Cannon.NAME: Cannon
${ModID}:Cannon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle !M! *Dazed into your draw pile.
${ModID}:Cannon.FLAVOR: Turning your staff into a cannon sounds awesome. NL But the kickback is a bitch.

${ModID}:Push.NAME: Push
${ModID}:Push.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards next turn.
${ModID}:Push.FLAVOR: It's a lot harder for foes to hurt you when they're several dozen feet away.

${ModID}:ManaBurst.NAME: Mana Burst
${ModID}:ManaBurst.DESCRIPTION: The first time you discard a ${ModID}:Sigil each turn, gain [E] and draw a card.
${ModID}:ManaBurst.FLAVOR: If you add more mana than necessary into the crafting process, you can get some back when you activate it.

${ModID}:LightningBlast.NAME: Lightning Blast
${ModID}:LightningBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Discard !M! cards next turn.
${ModID}:LightningBlast.FLAVOR: Turns out you can't actually see someone's skeleton when you electrocute them. Disappointing.

${ModID}:CurseArmor.NAME: Curse Armor
${ModID}:CurseArmor.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !${ModID}:M2! ${ModID}:Jinx to ALL enemies.
${ModID}:CurseArmor.FLAVOR: Don't bother bringing armor to fight a spellcaster. They can easily strip it away. Stay mobile.

${ModID}:ChillWind.NAME: Chill Wind
${ModID}:ChillWind.FLAVOR: Please practice this spell without saying "WHOOOSH! WHOOSH!"

${ModID}:Stoneskin.NAME: Stoneskin
${ModID}:Stoneskin.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you would take damage this turn, take !M! less.

${ModID}:Storm.NAME: Storm
${ModID}:Storm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Can only target an enemy with at least !M! debuffs.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Enemy does not have enough debuffs.

${ModID}:Shapeshift.NAME: Shapeshift
${ModID}:Shapeshift.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength and !${ModID}:M2! Dexterity. NL Upon pickup, gain a Soulbound *Injury.
${ModID}:Shapeshift.FLAVOR: Well of course it hurts. You rearranged your entire body including the organs.

${ModID}:Collapse.NAME: Collapse
${ModID}:Collapse.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Deals an additional !M! damage for each enemy in combat.

${ModID}:ShadowWhip.NAME: Shadow Whip
${ModID}:ShadowWhip.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you attack the enemy this turn gain !M! Temporary_HP.
${ModID}:ShadowWhip.FLAVOR: I resorted to this to take down a monster while in sight of some villagers. This is why I was thrown out.

${ModID}:Acoustics.NAME: Acoustics
${ModID}:Acoustics.DESCRIPTION: Resonant cards now target ALL enemies.
${ModID}:Acoustics.FLAVOR: With refined technique you can bounce some spells off one enemy and into another.

${ModID}:Haunt.NAME: Haunt
${ModID}:Haunt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you apply ${ModID}:Jinx, return this from the discard pile to your hand.

${ModID}:CallOfTheGrave.NAME: Call of the Grave
${ModID}:CallOfTheGrave.DESCRIPTION: Enemy takes !M! damage for each of its debuffs at the start of its turn.
${ModID}:CallOfTheGrave.FLAVOR: Ask not for whom the bell tolls. It tolls for people who have pissed me off.

${ModID}:SuddenSpasms.NAME: Sudden Spasms
${ModID}:SuddenSpasms.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to !M! times the enemy's ${ModID}:Jinx.
${ModID}:SuddenSpasms.FLAVOR: Try to hit them while they're talking. The sounds are hilarious.

${ModID}:Momentum.NAME: Momentum
${ModID}:Momentum.DESCRIPTION: The first time you play an attack each turn, draw a card.
${ModID}:Momentum.FLAVOR: Always keep your opponent on the defensive.

${ModID}:Confusion.NAME: Confusion
${ModID}:Confusion.FLAVOR: Disorient your enemies and they will get in each others way.

${ModID}:GolemForm.NAME: Golem Form
${ModID}:GolemForm.FLAVOR: My most important work.  Immunity to disease and old age.  Strength, durability.  Unfortunately I was exiled before I could transcend the human form.

${ModID}:SadisticGlee.NAME: Sadistic Glee
${ModID}:SadisticGlee.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy.
${ModID}:SadisticGlee.FLAVOR: Sometimes I get carried away in battle. And laugh a bit more than I should. But I'm not insane.

${ModID}:ElegantEtching.NAME: Elegant Etching
${ModID}:ElegantEtching.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a ${ModID}:Sigil is played, apply !M! ${ModID}:Jinx to ALL enemies.
${ModID}:ElegantEtching.FLAVOR: If you get the etching just right, you can put two spells into one sigil.

${ModID}:Madness.NAME: Madness
${ModID}:Madness.FLAVOR: In exchange for letting her observe my conclave, a Watcher taught us how to channel our rage. I decided to instead channel other people's rage.

${ModID}:QuickThinking.NAME: Quick Thinking
${ModID}:QuickThinking.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card.
${ModID}:QuickThinking.FLAVOR: The battlefield is not a good place to be going "uuhhhhhh..."

${ModID}:SustainedSummon.NAME: Sustained Summon
${ModID}:SustainedSummon.DESCRIPTION: Gain !${ModID}:M2! Orb slots. NL At the end of your turn, Channel a !M! damage ${ModID}:Panda.
${ModID}:SustainedSummon.FLAVOR: Unleashing these guys in combat creates... Pandamonium. Ba dum tsh.

${ModID}:Prepare.NAME: Prepare
${ModID}:Prepare.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, draw !M! additional cards and discard !M! cards.

${ModID}:MaliciousDagger.NAME: Malicious Dagger
${ModID}:MaliciousDagger.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Curse in your deck.
${ModID}:MaliciousDagger.FLAVOR: I don't just inflict curses. I know how to channel the negative energies if I am the victim.

${ModID}:ElementalConflux.NAME: Elemental Conflux
${ModID}:ElementalConflux.FLAVOR: They said it couldn't be done. But I managed to invent this anyway.

${ModID}:Wrath.NAME: Wrath
${ModID}:Wrath.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable.  NL At the end of your turn, ALL enemies gain !M! Strength.

${ModID}:BadLuck.NAME: Bad Luck
${ModID}:BadLuck.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Soulbound. NL Ethereal. NL When drawn, lose !M! Dexterity.

${ModID}:Whispers.NAME: Whispers
${ModID}:Whispers.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this is in your hand at the end of this turn, draw !M! less card next turn.

${ModID}:NullElement.NAME: Null Element
${ModID}:NullElement.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Soulbound. NL Ethereal. NL When drawn, lose [E].
